title: Florida Senior Acupuncture - About Us
description: Find out more about Florida Senior Acupuncture
cleaned_text: About Us Here at Florida Senior Acupuncture, we are dedicated to providing treatment developed specifically for you and your journey to wellness. Our goal is for you to regain your pain free life. Regain your life, get back to living Crystal Stokes Florida Senior Acupuncture is a Treasure Coast based acupuncture clinic established by Acupuncture Physician, Crystal Stokes LAc. Crystal continues to learn and work closely with global leaders in her field, to teach other practitioners expand their knowledge. Crystal has been practicing for over 14 years. Her western medical knowledge of neurology and neurosciences along with her advanced skills, are most effective in treatment of acute and chronic cases, along with central nervous system disorders. Crystal is dedicated to chronic and complex cases, helping many people regain their life... Our Clinic We are located on the Treasure Coast in the heart of Stuart, Florida with easy access from Federal Highway US 1. There is ample parking at our premises and we treat patients from all of the Treasure Coast, from Sebastian, Port St, Lucie St, Lucie County, Indian River and Martin County to Hobe sound.
